discussion.p: specifies an implementation and imposes requirements in text (and the implementation doesn't satisfy all of the text requirements). Pick one.

blockquote.p: The Remarks paragraph is an English re-statement of the preceeding Returns clause. It was meant to be clarifying and motivating, not confusing. I'm not aware with how the Remarks contradicts the Returns clause but I'm ok with simply removing the Remarks.
Pete suggests that this could be resolved by rephrasing the Remarks to Notes.
